scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=production EGG_SERVER_ENV=prod egg-scripts start --daemon --ignore-stderr --port=7001 --env=prod --workers=8 --title={{name}}-prod
scripts.staging: npm run clean && npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=staging EGG_SERVER_ENV=staging egg-scripts start --daemon --ignore-stderr --port=7001 --env=staging --workers=8 --title={{name}}-staging
scripts.testing: npm run clean && npm run tsc && NODE_ENV=testing EGG_SERVER_ENV=testing egg-scripts start --daemon --ignore-stderr --port=7001 --env=testing --workers=4 --title={{name}}-testing
scripts.test: npm run lint -- --fix && npm run test-local
scripts.tsc: npm run gencode && ets && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run cov && npm run tsc
